item.description:
Enhance your Healing Practice
For Reiki practitioners and others in the healing arts
Saturday, March 16, 9-noon $50

Take your healing practice to the next level to help your clients move deeply into their healing process through techniques that blend well with any healing modality. Understand how chakras correlate with emotional states, learn how to align your energy system and access protection; invoke angelic presence, use of silent prayers and affirmations. Use a pendulum to quickly assess chakras. Learn a fast shamanic practice of chakra release; alternative hand positions to invoke a deep sense of safety and love; use crystals to clear the energy field; enjoy practice time and community. Receive the Healer's Rite -one of the Rites of the Munay-Ki (www.Munay-Ki.org). Awakens the power in your hands so that everyone you touch is blessed.
item.name: Enhance your healing practice - for healing practitioners
